title: For #7430: Allow screen to turn off after media is paused/stopped

labels.name: 🛬 needs landing

body:
This fix uses the extension methods in Activity from AC library to enter and exit from immersive modes
@Mugurell , This PR is meant as a replacement for #7437 for the following reason. Sorry for any inconvenience.
I couldn't successfully squash the commits  related to #7437. So I created a new branch(issue7430fix)  with the changes to push  to [indurs:issuefix7430](https://github.com/indurs/focus-android/tree/issuefix7430). But I forgot to commit the changes in the new branch before I pushed using "git push origin issue7430fix:issuefix7430 -f". I'm not sure why but the PR is closed automatically.
